titles.title: Stewart B. McKinney National Wildlife Refuge Designation Act of 1987
A bill to change the name of the "Connecticut Coastal National Wildlife Refuge" to the "Stewart B. McKinney National Wildlife Refuge".

action.text: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.
Other Measure S.1167 Passed House in Lieu.
Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

bill.summary: 5/8/1987--Introduced. Stewart B. McKinney National Wildlife Refuge Designation Act of 1987 - Redesignates the Connecticut Coastal National Wildlife Refuge as the Stewart B. McKinney National Wildlife Refuge. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to accept future memorials to be placed in such Refuge. Authorizes appropriations.
